mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thomas Lawrence and His Second Wife Susan Ballenger (Baelinger)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thomas Lawrence & Susan Ballinger Lawrence, Thomas 1824-1897 was the 13th son of John and Nancy Peden Lawrence, who had a farm on Brush Creek. He was a grandson of John Lawrence, a Rev. War veteran Baptist minister who settled near Radford from NY. Thomas married Susan O'Brien, gran
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lawrence, Thomas
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
